title: What Were We Wrong About Before the Season? | Group Chat (Ep. 345)
description:
Kyle Korver to the Jazz (0:40), Luka Doncic owns our hearts (7:30), the Wolves are looking up without Jimmy Butler (17:30), and the Clippers might be a playoff lock (22:08). Plus, we admit the takes we misfired on before the season (35:30).

Hosts: Chris Ryan, Haley O’Shaughnessy, Justin Verrier, and Paolo Uggetti

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
